scripts.preinstall: (npm list requirejs -g || sudo npm install requirejs -g) && (npm list terser -g || sudo npm install terser -g)
scripts.bundlejs: find ${npm_package_bundle_dir} -mindepth 1 -maxdepth 1 \( -not -name '*_source' \) -type d -execdir mv -f \{} \{}_source \; && find ${npm_package_bundle_dir[@]} -mindepth 1 -maxdepth 1 \( -name '*_source' \) -type d -exec bash -c 'r.js -o requirejs-bundle-config.js baseUrl=\{} dir=${@%'_source'}' bash {} \; && npm run minify
